name: Zombie Basement
description:
Our game that we created in two and a half day, during  the International Educations GameJam .

You are trapped in your grandmas basement full of zombies and you need to find all of her belongings before you can leave. Don't get eaten by a zombie!

Controls: 

Move: WASD or arrow keys

Aim flashlight:  with the mouse.

Pickup Items: Walk into them.
